name: Steel Love: The Video Game
description:
Follow Ziv Chromebeak on his adventure to save his old friend, Singuliera, who was kidnapped by the hands of a killer robot. And Peet is there, too! 

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Left Click - Interact

Shift - Run

We had to trim and cut, then trim some more, then re-evaluate and re-imagine our scope of this project. This is as buttoned up as we could get everything before the submissions were due. We hope you get a laugh out of this experience.

By: QuarterAfterFour

Art/Assets/Intro Cinematic- Garfunkel

Programming - Spyle and Emily
